text: The Supercopa Euroamericana was a friendly football tournament created by DirecTV played from 2015 to 2016 in the Americas. It was contested between the Copa Sudamericana and the UEFA Europa League winners.Copa EuroAmericana The match was organised by DirecTV in 2015 and LFP World Challenge in 2016. ==Format== The match is played all 90 minutes. In case of a tie after the 90 minutes, will proceed to play two fifteen-minute overtime periods, and if they continue in a draw the champion will be defined through a series of penalty kicks. ==List of finals== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+Key |- | width="40px" bgcolor="#FBCEB1"| | Match was won during extra time |- | width="40px" bgcolor="#cedff2"|* | Match was won on a penalty shoot-out |} * The "Season" column refers to the season the competition was held, and wikilinks to the article about that season. * The wikilinks in the "Score" column point to the article about that season's final game. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |+List of Supercopa Euroamericana finals |- !scope="col"|# !scope="col"|Season !scope="col"|Nation !scope="col"|Winners !scope="col"|Score !scope="col"|Runners-up !scope="col"|Nation !scope="col"|Venue !scope="col"| |- !scope="row" style="text-align:center"|1 !scope="row" style="text-align:center"|2015 | |River Plate |align=center|1–0 |Sevilla | |Estadio Monumental, Buenos Aires |align=center|54,000 |- !scope="row" style="text-align:center"|2 !scope="row" style="text-align:center"|2016 | |Sevilla |align=center|2–1 |Santa Fe | |ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, Bay Lake, Florida |align=center|5,000 |- |} ==Performances== ===By club=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |+ Performances in the Supercopa Euroamericana by club |- !scope=col|Club !scope=col|Titles !scope=col|Runners-up !scope=col|Seasons won !scope=col|Seasons runner-up |- !
